ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: Dhole predation on these ungulates did not differ from random.
sentences.chinese: 豺的取食情况则相当随机。

sentences.english: The father Jackal bowed very low.
sentences.chinese: 豺爸爸弓低了自己的腰。

sentences.english: A'cai, chief of Tu Gu Hun, had 20 sons.
sentences.chinese: 吐谷浑的首领阿豺有二十个儿子。

sentences.english: Dholes also preyed more upon adult male than adult female chital.
sentences.chinese: 豺对于白斑鹿同样更多捕食成年雄性。

sentences.english: As a large group they can attack even gaur, leopard and even tiger.
sentences.chinese: 大群的豺甚至可以攻击野牛，豹甚至老虎。

definition: jackal and wolf/ravenous wolf/fig. evil person/vicious tyrant
aardwolf (Proteles cristatus), a small insectivorous relative of the hyena
